extendedInfo.description: CheckRidePrep is a review/testing application designed by an Air Force pilot to help prepare you for your written & oral FAA exam while also providing a general knowledge refresher for seasoned pilots.Features:- Easy to use "on the go" application; no Internet access required- Perfect for both airplane and helicopter pilots- Official FAA question database...over 900+ questions with figures- Create Custom Tests based on subjects and # of questions- Quick Test with 20 random questions from all subject areas- Mark questions to review later- Moveable and pinch-to-zoom figures All these features in a simple to use format for a fraction of the cost of traditional paper pilot study books.A must have for:- Student pilots preparing for their FAA written and oral exams- CFI's to quiz your students on the ground or in the air- Professional pilots who want to stay current on all their general knowledgeKeywords: Private pilot, student pilot, check ride, checkride, FAA written examination, study guide, commercial pilot, FAA knowledge examination, ground school, recreational pilot, glider pilot

reviews.title: Not bad, needs improvements
reviews.comment: can not zoom in on charts or weather maps, becomes to hard to read, Also not really a \"check-ride\
Great study app! Easy to use and awesome for preparing for my ppl throughout the day.
reviews.author: A Google User
